name: Foofary'all
description:
Created by the team "The Good, The Bad, and The Howdy" at the 48 Hour Game Jam, Chillennium. Team members: Carolyn Hua, Erin Makela, Jessica McNeme, and Logan Hardin.

Blue and Red are sworn enemies- at least, ever since they knocked over a glass of milk! While their disagreement may have originally been petty, they've let it escalate to comic proportions! See just how far these two will go to prove who is the true winner as they try to grow the biggest hat or eat the most hot dogs. Face off against one of your real-life friends in these exciting Western themed mini games! Play either as the rotund sheriff Blue or the dastardly cowboy Red.

Featuring original soundtrack by Logan Hardin.
